actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: Resolution relating to the Economic Plight of Dairy Farmers in the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that the President should initiate prompt action to assist the Nation's dairy farmers, including: (1) limitation of dairy imports; (2) hearings on possible increases in the floor price used for determining milk prices; and (3) an increase in dairy product price supports.

titles.title: Resolution relating to the Economic Plight of Dairy Farmers in the United States.
